meanings.definition: Either of the two male reproductive glands, located in the scrotum, that produce sperm and testosterone.
meanings.sent1: The testis plays a crucial role in producing sperm.
meanings.sent2: Doctors can examine the testis to check for any abnormalities.
meanings.sent3: The testis decided to take a vacation from producing sperm, causing quite a stir.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to his work was like a testis, tirelessly producing results.
meanings.sent5: The testis, like a tiny factory, diligently manufactures sperm.
